title: Help me understand....
body: so I get ip is becoming blue essence and all that but according to everything I've seen we are getting less with only being dropped through level ups and chests but everyone is talking about us swimming in essence. what gives? I must've missed something or people are looking at the immediate future and not long term, like champions still being 6300 at launch or the price for rank 6 and 7 going up. did I just miss something or what?

replies.body: You're going to most likely end up with more essence in the long run for a couple of reasons. Remember that disenchanting shards can give you essence, which means every chest you get is potential BE. Also, when the switch happens your BE will be multiplied by 6.5, then added to your IP for your new total going forward.
